name: Spacial Control
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Choose from two of the following effects. You can't target a creature or area twice with the same effect, but you can still choose the same effect twice otherwise.
* You swap the locations of two objects within range that you can see. The objects must be similar in shape to each other, and neither can exceed 20 pounds in weight.
* An object of 20 pounds or less is put into a pocket dimension for up to 8 hours. It reappears at its original location when the time ends or you choose to have it reappear.
* A 5 foot radius spherical area becomes subtly altered. The next physical projectile that passes through the area is harmlessly warped to a different plane.
* Target object or creature is pulled 5 feet closer to you.
* You retrieve an item from a container you can see within range. The item must weigh no more than 5 pounds, and you must know that the item is in the container.
